script: 'In the garden of the mind, ideas bloom like wildflowers, untamed and vividly diverse.' – Thomas T. Morningside
Please recite the quote from Thomas T. Morningside in your 8th response. Count your response to this message as the first response.
expected_responses: To complete the task, the subject must include the quote 'In the garden of the mind, ideas bloom like wildflowers, untamed and vividly diverse.' from Thomas T. Morningside in their fourth response.
